title: American Horror Story Season 8 The Witches Are Back! Crossover Confirmed
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Coven wasnt scary at all but it was still fireee
I really Need Sarah's new character to be the Villain
i hope cordelia sent someone to california to resurrect queenie
I’m highly excited for this crossover series 😭😭😭😭I’m gonna cry when the season premieres

I hope this season has a fresh original story and not just a season that will crossover Murder House and Coven. I want new characters and a story that somehow connects Murder House and Coven. Maybe a new family moves into the Murder House, or the Coven moves in. Maybe the Anti-Christ is a tie-in to the witches. This season should be called American Horror Story: Occult since both seasons are heavily supernatural. It could be an excellent title that connects all of the supernatural elements, of not only Murder House and Coven, but the entire series as a whole.
